body:
quiche fails to build under clang 10

*Repro steps*:

```
$ bazel test @envoy//test/...
```

*Config*:

Fedora 32 (beta)

```
$ clang --version
clang version 10.0.0 (Fedora 10.0.0-1.fc32)
Target: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /usr/bin
```

*Logs*:

```
ERROR: /home/jpeach/.cache/bazel/_bazel_jpeach/7c2d9035a20b19c4e33497f8740ac936/external/com_googlesource_quiche/BUILD.bazel:2941:1: C++ compilation of rule '@com_googlesource_quiche//:quic_core_stream_send_buffer_lib' failed (Exit 1) clang failed: error executing command /usr/bin/clang -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -Wthread-safety -Wself-assign -fcolor-diagnostics -fno-omit-frame-pointer -g '-std=c++0x' -MD -MF ... (remaining 316 argument(s) skipped)

Use --sandbox_debug to see verbose messages from the sandbox
In file included from bazel-out/k8-dbg/bin/external/com_googlesource_quiche/quiche/quic/core/quic_stream_send_buffer.cc:9:
In file included from bazel-out/k8-dbg/bin/external/com_googlesource_quiche/quiche/quic/core/quic_stream_send_buffer.h:9:
bazel-out/k8-dbg/bin/external/com_googlesource_quiche/quiche/quic/core/quic_circular_deque.h:61:5: error: definition of implicit copy assignment operator for 'basic_iterator<quic::BufferedSlice>' is deprecated because it has a user-declared copy constructor [-Werror,-Wdeprecated-copy]
    basic_iterator(
    ^
/usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/10/../../../../include/c++/10/bits/stl_algobase.h:1317:16: note: in implicit copy assignment operator for 'quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> >::basic_iterator<quic::BufferedSlice>' first required here
              __first = __middle;
                      ^
/usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/10/../../../../include/c++/10/bits/stl_algo.h:2041:19: note: in instantiation of function template specialization 'std::__lower_bound<quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> >::basic_iterator<quic::BufferedSlice>, unsigned long, __gnu_cxx::__ops::_Iter_comp_val<quic::QuicIntervalDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> > >::IntervalCompare> >' requested here
      return std::__lower_bound(__first, __last, __val,
                  ^
bazel-out/k8-dbg/bin/external/com_googlesource_quiche/quiche/quic/core/quic_interval_deque.h:380:19: note: in instantiation of function template specialization 'std::lower_bound<quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> >::basic_iterator<quic::BufferedSlice>, unsigned long, quic::QuicIntervalDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> > >::IntervalCompare>' requested here
  auto res = std::lower_bound(begin, end, interval_begin, IntervalCompare());
                  ^
bazel-out/k8-dbg/bin/external/com_googlesource_quiche/quiche/quic/core/quic_interval_deque.h:309:12: note: in instantiation of member function 'quic::QuicIntervalDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> > >::Search' requested here
    return Search(interval_begin, 0, container_.size());
           ^
bazel-out/k8-dbg/bin/external/com_googlesource_quiche/quiche/quic/core/quic_stream_send_buffer.cc:113:40: note: in instantiation of member function 'quic::QuicIntervalDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, quic::QuicCircularDeque<quic::BufferedSlice, 3, std::allocator<quic::BufferedSlice> > >::DataAt' requested here
  for (auto slice_it = interval_deque_.DataAt(offset);
                                       ^
1 error generated.
```

labels.description: stalebot believes this issue/PR has not been touched recently
labels.name: stale

title: quiche build failure under clang 10
